snp4.12:1.3: ‘Whoever sees it this way has understood the teaching;
snp4.12:1.4: those who reject this are deficient.’
snp4.12:2.2: saying, ‘The other is a fool, an amateur!’
snp4.12:2.3: Which one of these speaks true,
snp4.12:2.4: for everyone claims to be an expert?”
snp4.12:3.2: makes one a worthless fool lacking wisdom,
snp4.12:3.3: then they’re all fools lacking wisdom,
snp4.12:3.4: for they all maintain our own view.
snp4.12:4.1: But if they are pristine because of their own view,
snp4.12:4.2: purified in wisdom, expert and intelligent,
snp4.12:4.3: then none of them lack wisdom,
snp4.12:4.4: for that is how their views are adopted.
